section.title: Overview
section.para: This is a simple module allowing to retrieve values from a JSON string.
For more complex operations with JSON documents, see the JANSSON module.

section.title: &kamailio; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
None

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para:
The following libraries or applications must be installed before running &kamailio; with this module loaded:
libjson (https://github.com/json-c/json-c/wiki)
Copy field 'field_name' from json object 'json_string' and store it in pvar 'destination'.
